# context_call

The ContextCall module for generating responses using LLMs with context.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/context_call/index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/context_call/index" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/context_call/index" symbolName="ContextResponse" /> ContextResponse

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/context_call/index" symbolName="Stream" /> Stream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="calls/context_call/index" symbolName="BaseContextCall" /> BaseContextCall

A base class for generating responses with context using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="calls/context_call/index" symbolName="ContextCall" /> ContextCall

A class for generating responses using LLMs.
